name: Purgatory Dragon Deity, Favrneel
effect:
[CONT]:You may only have one "Purgatory Dragon Deity, Favrneel" in the deck.
[AUTO](VC):At the beginning of your main phase, your opponent chooses one of their rear-guards, retires it, and if you did not ride this turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000/[Critical] +1.
[AUTO](VC):When your opponent's rear-guard is retired during your turn, [COST][put a card from hand into soul], and draw a card.
[AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:At the end of the battle this unit attacked, if the sum of the grades of 《Dark States》 cards in your soul is thirteen or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 2], [Stand] this unit, and it gets drive-1 until end of turn.
productName: [VGE-D-SS07] Cardfight!! Vanguard Special Series 07: Stand Up Deckset “Favrneel”

name: Gear Rhinos of Barrelling Impulsion
effect: [CONT](VC):When you would ride from the ride deck, you can ride with "[Soul-Blast 1]" instead of "Choose a card from hand, and discard it".
productName: [VGE-D-SS07] Cardfight!! Vanguard Special Series 07: Stand Up Deckset “Favrneel”

name: Divigating Chopper
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, draw a card, choose a card from your hand, and discard it.
productName: [VGE-D-SS07] Cardfight!! Vanguard Special Series 07: Stand Up Deckset “Favrneel”

name: Clock-hands Dracokid

name: Reaper in the Shadows, Zeilmort
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put this unit into soul], look at the top two cards of your deck, choose up to one card from among them, call it to (RC), and put the rest into soul.
productName: [VGE-D-SS07] Cardfight!! Vanguard Special Series 07: Stand Up Deckset “Favrneel”

name: Execution Dragon, Vorpal Scythe Dragon

name: Purgatory Baron, Hrodis
effect:
[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked a vanguard, if you have a vanguard with "Favrneel" in its card name, [COST][put this unit into soul], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.
[AUTO](Soul):At the beginning of your ride phase, if you have a vanguard with "Favrneel" in its card name, [COST][bind this card & discard a card from hand], activate persona ride, and until end of turn, you cannot activate persona ride with other card effects, and you cannot ride.
productName: [VGE-D-SS07] Cardfight!! Vanguard Special Series 07: Stand Up Deckset “Favrneel”

name: Squalid Freaks
effect:

[AUTO](Soul):When your grade 3 or greater vanguard attacks, if you did not ride this turn, [COST][bind this card], and all of your front row units get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
productName: [VGE-D-SS07] Cardfight!! Vanguard Special Series 07: Stand Up Deckset “Favrneel”
